summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5693 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Roosevelt Heights 2nd Addition, and same produced across unplatted property, being the alley between 34th Avenue Northeast and 35th Avenue Northeast, from East 68th Street to East 70th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75287, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
